review: I  purchased the fire stick on sale for $19.99 and was in love with it until my internet  provider called and said my data was all used. Is there anything I can do so, It does not use so much data quickly?
author: Belinda

review: 4 stars for style ease of use. Negative stars for not having away of storing / removing unwanted factory apps. Theres a lot of apps but me 'm simply and detest having always navigate what to me is junk.......
author: R. J. Rodriguez

review: Super easy to set up! Had absolutely no problems what so ever! Access in less than 5 minutes!Great content and available apps! I am enjoying watching all my prime videos!! Cancelled cable!The best part is the android remote app! Can use talk to search and all other controls as well!Really a great addition to my home system! Probably will buy​ another so I don't have to take this one to another room!
author: The Ardent Reader "L4JA"

review: LOVE LOVE LOVE this!!! Works awesome :D pretty easy to set up and a nice video to explain what you can do with the remote. I use this on a daily basis just about every night!
author: El "lab"

review: I had originally had a roku so had to get used to the menu of the FireStick... but I think I'm going to get another one for my other TV.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I love using it, it is literally my cable especially using slingtv

review: Great product but needs some work on app that I owm.
author: George

review: My entire family loves this product. Worth much more than it costs. Easy to install, set up and use! Lightening fast with everything we've used it for so far.
author: Danielle Geraci
